rto_policy: Hybrid - 2 days per week in office
details: Corporate employees are expected to go into an office at least 2 days a week, including Tuesday and Wednesday. Employees report tremendous flexibility to perform work while balancing family.
notes: NRG Energy operates a hybrid model with specific required days (Tuesday and Wednesday). The policy allows remote work for the remaining days of the week.

rto_policy: Hybrid - 3 days per week in office
details: Stryker values in-person collaboration and teamwork, with most offices allowing hybrid work a couple days a week. Employees typically try to be on-site Monday through Wednesday, with Thursday and Friday being flexible in some cases. Flexibility varies by role, and most management positions have some flexibility.
notes: Stryker follows a hybrid model with in-office presence typically Monday through Wednesday. The specific arrangement depends on the department and position, with individual teams having some flexibility based on operational needs.

rto_policy: Hybrid - 2 days per week in office (varies by division)
details: Some employees have been moved from fully remote to a 2-day-per-week in-office requirement. Policies may vary by division (Textron Aviation, Textron Systems, etc.). The company has been reducing remote work options rather than expanding them, with limited flexibility for remote/hybrid arrangements at some subsidiaries.
notes: Textron's policy appears to vary significantly by division and location. Some employees report being required to come to the office 2 days per week, while others indicate limited remote/hybrid opportunities. The company appears to be trending toward more in-office requirements. Specific details for different divisions may vary.

rto_policy: Hybrid - 4 days per week in office (as of September 2025)
details: Ameriprise Financial previously required employees to be in the office 3 days per week since 2021, but starting in September 2025, the requirement increases to 4 days per week. This places Ameriprise on the more structured end of hybrid policies among Fortune 500 companies.
notes: Ameriprise Financial has increased its in-office requirement from 3 days to 4 days per week starting in September 2025. This represents a significant shift toward more in-office presence, joining other major Minnesota-based companies in this trend. The move aligns with broader industry trends toward increased office presence in 2025.

rto_policy: Hybrid - 3 days per week in office
details: As of July 2025, Honeywell has a hybrid policy allowing 3 days on site and 2 days remote for certain positions. This aligns with the company's flexible work approach from 2022 when they introduced hybrid work requiring workers to come into the office three days a week. Policy may vary by division, location, and role type.
notes: Honeywell maintains a 3-2 hybrid work schedule (3 days in office, 2 days remote) for eligible positions. While there were discussions in early 2024 about a potential move to 5 days per week in some divisions (particularly in Aero division), the 3-2 hybrid model appears to remain the standard company-wide policy as of mid-2025. Not all positions are eligible for hybrid work arrangements.
